headline.main: Liquid Diet Should Be Handled With Care
HEALTH: Nutrition; Help Wanted: Successful Dieters

byline.original: By GINA KOLATA, Special to the New York Times

docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: Essentially all the information that has been gathered on obesity and how to treat it comes from studies of people who seek out medical researchers, often after years of fruitless attempts to control their weight. But researchers question whether these people are truly representative of the obese and ask whether there is a group of people who never volunteer for studies and are able to diet successfully.
